mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist ( orderlistid, pid, number, addtime, orderid, userid, itemstatus ) VALUES ( #{orderlistid}, #{pid}, #{number}, #{addtime}, #{orderid}, #{id}, #{itemstatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.number,d.price,c.userid,c.orderlistid,c.pid FROM orderlist c LEFT JOIN pms_product d ON c.pid=d.pid WHERE c.userid=#{userid} and c.itemstatus=0
SELECT a.pid,a.pname,a.price,a.image,b.number FROM pms_product a LEFT JOIN orderlist b ON a.pid=b.pid WHERE b.userid=#{id} and b.itemstatus=0
SELECT * FROM orderlist WHERE userid = #{0} AND pid = #{1} AND itemstatus = #{2}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM orderlist WHERE orderlist.pid = #{pid} and orderlist.itemstatus=0 ;
